LanguageData.SY_BNV.TooltipCopyToAll: Copies all non-global settings to all other buildings of this type
LanguageData.SY_BNV.SelectNewThingDef: Select new thing which can be added to this list
LanguageData.SY_BNV.TooltipCurveX: The value to apply this factor at\nFor example, with two points, (0, 1) and (0, 1.25) a value of 1 results in a factor of 1.25, a value of 0 in 1.00 and a value of 0.6 in 1.15\nThe outcome is interpolated between two points
LanguageData.SY_BNV.TooltipCurveY: The factor to apply at this value\nFor example, with two points, (-5, 0.7) and (-1, 0.9) a value of -5 results in a factor of 0.7, a value of -1 in 0.9 and a value of -3 in 0.8\nThe outcome is interpolated between two points
LanguageData.SY_BNV.TooltipWorkToBuild: Amount of work needed to build this building
LanguageData.SY_BNV.TooltipActivePowerConsumption: Default power consumption of this building\nSome buildings consume less power while idle, others consume more when in use
LanguageData.SY_BNV.TooltipAnyoneCanBuild: Removes the meme-restriction from this building\nApplies to all buildings of this type
LanguageData.SY_BNV.TooltipStandbyPowerConsumption: Power consumed while the building is not in use
LanguageData.SY_BNV.TooltipReadyEffectState: Select how the ready effect will be displayed\nApplies to all Biosculpter Pods
LanguageData.SY_BNV.TooltipReadyEffectColor: Adjust the color of the ready effect\nNot relevant if state is set to "Always Off"
LanguageData.SY_BNV.TooltipNutritionRequired: Nutrition required per cycle\nApplies to all Biosculpter Pods
LanguageData.SY_BNV.TooltipBiotunedDuration: Duration for how long the biotuning of a pod lasts\nApplies to all Biosculpter Pods
LanguageData.SY_BNV.TooltipBiotunedCycleSpeedFactor: Cycle speed modifier when a pod is biotuned
LanguageData.SY_BNV.TooltipSpeedFactor: Base cycle speed factor for this pod, further modified by biotuning, cleanliness factor etc.
LanguageData.SY_BNV.TooltipCycleDuration: Duration for completion of this cycle
LanguageData.SY_BNV.TooltipAgeReversalCycleAgeReverse: Life time reversed by this cycle\nApplies to all Biosculpter Pods
LanguageData.SY_BNV.TooltipPleasureCycleMoodEffect: Mood bonus from this cycle's mood buff\nApplies to all Biosculpter Pods
LanguageData.SY_BNV.TooltipPleasureCycleMoodDuration: Duration of this cycle's mood buff\nApplies to all Biosculpter Pods
LanguageData.SY_BNV.TooltipTicksToRecharge: Recharge time in ticks before the Neural Supercharger can be used again\n(2'500 = 1 ingame hour, 60'000 = 1 ingame day)
LanguageData.SY_BNV.TooltipHediffDisappearsAfterTicks: Time in ticks for how long the Neural Supercharge hediff lasts\n(2'500 = 1 ingame hour, 60'000 = 1 ingame day)\nApplies to all Neural Superchargers
LanguageData.SY_BNV.TooltipHediffConsciousness: Consciousness bonus while hediff is active\nApplies to all Neural Superchargers
LanguageData.SY_BNV.TooltipHediffLearningFactor: Learning rate increase while hediff is active\nApplies to all Neural Superchargers
LanguageData.SY_BNV.TooltipHediffHungerRateFactor: Hunger rate increase while hediff is active\nApplies to all Neural Superchargers
LanguageData.SY_BNV.InUsePowerConsumption: In-use power consumption (requires reload if toggled)
LanguageData.SY_BNV.TooltipInUsePowerConsumption: Additional power consumed while the building is in use
LanguageData.SY_BNV.TooltipBedRestEffectiveness: Rest effectiveness modifier for pawns using a Sleep Accelerator
LanguageData.SY_BNV.TooltipBedHungerRateFactor: Hunger rate modifier for pawns using a Sleep Accelerator
